package.name: motoman_gp215-250_support

description.p: ROS-Industrial support for the Motoman GP215 and GP250 (variants).
This package contains configuration data, 3D models and launch files for Motoman GP215/250 manipulators.

Joint limits and maximum joint velocities are based on the information found in: YASKAWA MOTOMAN-GP215,GP250 INSTRUCTIONS (HW2480629) version 194804-1CD, rev 1. YASKAWA MOTOMAN-GP215,GP250,GP280 INSTRUCTIONS (HW1484400) version 182639-1CD, rev 2.
All urdfs are based on the default motion and joint velocity limits, unless noted otherwise.
Before using any of the configuration files and / or meshes included in this package, be sure to check they are correct for the particular robot model and configuration you intend to use them with.

package.author: Eric Marcil
package.maintainer: G.A. vd. Hoorn (TU Delft Robotics Institute)
